fullText: Stephen Adly Guirgis's Pulitzer Prize-winning play gets a Broadway production that honors both its gritty realism and its surprising moments of grace.
dtliExcerpt: Stephen Adly Guirgis's Pulitzer Prize-winning play gets a Broadway production that honors both its gritty realism and its surprising moments of grace.
